response.overview: While Po and his father are visiting a secret panda village, an evil spirit threatens all of China, forcing Po to form a ragtag army to fight back.
response.tagline: Grab destiny by the rice dumplings.
response.title: Kung Fu Panda 3

cast.name: Mike Mitchell
cast.character: Male Palace Goose / Smart Panda Villager (voice)

results.name: Po Meets His Dad Extended Preview
